long_description: You are standing inside the lobby of Manor South. It smells bad in here.
short_description: You glance around the Manor South Lobby.

long_description: You are standing in front of the Slums- I mean the Manors.
short_description: You look out at the road out front of the Manors.

long_description: You stand inside the Student Union building, ahead of you is the Dining Hall.
Looking around West Campus, you see the Rutter's to the west and the road back to main on the east.
